Title: We Were All Someone Else Yesterday
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Adam Targum
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Hood copes with Siobhan's death. The FBI takes over in the hunt for Chayton. A wedge is driven between Proctor and Rebecca.
